System::Singleton

System::Singleton< T > Class Template Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

template<class T>
class System::Singleton< T >

Base class to create controlled singletons. In this class the creation and destruction of the singleton are controlled. The creation occurs with the first getSingleton call, and the destruction when the method destroySingleton is called.

For internal use only.


Static Public Member Functions

static T & getSingleton ()
 Returns a reference to the singleton instance The first call will create the singleton.
static T * getSingletonPtr ()
 Returns a pointer to the singleton instance The first call will create the singleton.
static void destroySingleton ()
 To destroy the singleton.
